overview: The subject examines current and emerging topical areas within accounting research. Specific topics may be drawn from any area of contemporary developments in accounting research (e.g., financial, managerial, audit, systems).
ilo: Explain the key issues associated with the special topic;
Analyse the relationship of the special topic to the broader accounting research literature.
generic_skills: Synthesis of data and other information
Evaluation of data and other information
Accessing data and other information from a range of sources

Inherent requirements (core participatio.content: Further details on how to seek academic adjustments can be found on the Student Equity and Disability Support website:http://services.unimelb.edu.au/student-equity/home

assessment.brief: A written assignment of 2000 words due at the end of the teaching period.
